text: To be eligible for Ujjivan Bank Privilege Savings Account, individual needs to meet any of the below criterion:
AMB in SA - `25,000 & above.
Cumulative FD - `10 Lakhs & above.
Salary credit (p.m.) - `30,000 & above.
Flexible to use - No Minimum balance charges.
Unlimited FREE IMPS/NEFT/RTGS through IB/MB.
Unlimited FREE transactions across any bank ATM.
25 FREE cheque leaves per quarter.
NO Additional charges for Non- Home branch transactions.
Free Cash Deposit & Withdrawal at any Ujjivan bank branch.

Best in class Lifetime FREE RuPay Platinum debit card with multifarious benefits. Enhanced limits of `1,00,000 per day in ATM & `2,00,000 per day in Shopping Lounge Access - 2 free access per quarter across 30+ Domestic lounges PAN India 5% cash back on Utility Bill payments (up to a monthly cap of `50/-). Higher accidental insurance up to `2,00,000 per annum
Enhanced limits of `1,00,000 per day in ATM & `2,00,000 per day in Shopping
Lounge Access - 2 free access per quarter across 30+ Domestic lounges PAN India
5% cash back on Utility Bill payments (up to a monthly cap of `50/-).
Higher accidental insurance up to `2,00,000 per annum

The Platinum Debit features and benefits on Rupay Platinum Debit Card are provided by Rupay and can be discontinued at any time without any prior notice to the customer at the sole discretion of the Bank/Rupay.
personalised RuPay Platinum Debit Card.
25 Cheque leaves.
Interest is calculated on daily end of day balance.
Interest to be credited quarterly.
Free SMS facility to the registered Mobile number.
Remittance facility - NEFT, IMPS & RTGS.
Access to your account across all Ujjivan SFB branches.
24*7 access to your account through Ujjivan helpline - 1800-208-2121.
User friendly Ujjivan Internet & Mobile Banking platforms.
24*7 access to all Ujjivan Biometric enabled ATMs.
